citations.narrative:
There were no minutes for the IACUC meeting that was held on 5/19/22 available for review at the time of the inspection.
Per this Section, a research facility shall maintain minutes of IACUC meetings that include records of attendance,
activities of the Committee, and Committee deliberations. Maintaining minutes of IACUC meetings is important to
document the activities of the IACUC. Correct from this date 2/23/23 forward.

The IACUC’s Spring 2022 Semi-annual Report to the Institutional Official (IO) for the Committee’s May 2022 evaluations
of the Program and animal facility was not available for review at the time of the inspection.
Per this Section, a research facility shall maintain records of the Semi-annual Reports to the Institutional Official prepared
by the IACUC and submitted in accordance with the requirements of Section 2.31 (c)(3). Maintaining the Semi-annual
Reports to the IO documents that the Committee has performed their required functions regarding the semiannual reviews
of the Program and animal facilities and has reported their recommendations and updated their report to the IO. Correct
from this date 2/23/23 forward.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representative.
*END OF REPORT*
End Section

narrative:
2.35(a)(1) 
   
Recordkeeping requirements. 
There were no minutes for the IACUC meeting that was held on 5/19/22 available for review at the time of the inspection. 
 
Per this Section, a research facility shall maintain minutes of IACUC meetings that include records of attendance, 
activities of the Committee, and Committee deliberations. Maintaining minutes of IACUC meetings is important to 
document the activities of the IACUC. Correct from this date 2/23/23 forward. 
2.35(a)(3) 
   
Recordkeeping requirements. 
The IACUC’s Spring 2022 Semi-annual Report to the Institutional Official (IO) for the Committee’s May 2022 evaluations 
of the Program and animal facility was not available for review at the time of the inspection. 
 
Per this Section, a research facility shall maintain records of the Semi-annual Reports to the Institutional Official prepared 
by the IACUC and submitted in accordance with the requirements of Section 2.31 (c)(3). Maintaining the Semi-annual 
Reports to the IO documents that the Committee has performed their required functions regarding the semiannual reviews

of the Program and animal facilities and has reported their recommendations and updated their report to the IO. Correct 
from this date 2/23/23 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representative. 
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
End Section
